Diluting the solution with more acid will not neutralize the acid, and pouring it down the sink can cause damage to pipes and sewage systems. Absorbing the liquid with paper towels will not neutralize the acid and can also cause damage to the paper towel. Therefore, option (B) is the correct answer. The answer is (B) neutralize the solution with a base.
